question: Hello, I was born in BC and went to school in BC, now in Alberta. I do not have a record of my immunizations. How would I obtain this? Old family doctor has long since retired. Thank you!
question_variation_1: where do i find family dr records with long been retired
question_variation_2: do you have a record of immunizations
